author: junkraat

text: Absolutely beautiful song. Sakuraba is a genius! Man....I remember playing this game and enjoying the hell out of it. Still holds up to this very day. It's soundtrack is a key component to its full experience though. Sakuraba's peak in my opinion. I'm trying to arrange a tribute remix album for him and all games under Tri-Ace and Tri-Crescendo. If you're a musician and interested, PM me.

author: hobbitgoblin

text: Picked this up in 2005 and I still play it once in a blue moon. Every time I play it through, the music gives me the chills, in a good way :) Don't think I could ever part with this game, it would be like throwing away my FF collection i've had over 10+ years >.<
author: CMValus

text: lol 2012, March 2nd, I am 19 years old and I STILL play this game. Lol epic xD. Love the music, story(line) an combat system!:) (Especially because it's so different from all the popular crap that's comming out nowdays.) (Although excluding me3 and gw2 those will be and already are awesome ^^) Have lost count of how many times I cleared this game and not just the main story, all side quests to :P:):D.
